============================================================   
LinoLetter 06/04   
============================================================   
   
! Welcome to the sixth issue of the LinoLetter in 2004 !   
   
INTRODUCTION:   
As welcome to summer, Linotype Library is offering a few   
new and interesting novelties to our customers, along with   
our traditional product line.   
   
First off, we are pleased to announce our new Affiliate   
Program; all interested webmasters may participate in this   
new business opportunity.   
   
To celebrate the ascension of the 10 new EU-member states,   
Linotype Library is now specially offering all 18 weights   
of Frutiger Next in Central European font format. With this   
stroke, one of our most famous typefaces can now be used to   
set all Eastern European languages.   
   
Our latest Value Pack offers the five best fonts from the   
Sassoon family, a real typographic treat. The Value Pack   
offers an attractive price, making this a good opportunity   
to give this timeless, beautiful, and flexible type family   
a spin.   
   
Lastly, we would like to invite you to experience the   
"Roaring 20s" once again, specifically its exciting,   
constructivist typefaces.   
   
Have fonts of fun!   
   
   
   
------------------------------------------------------------   
   
IN THIS ISSUE:   
   
1. Linotype Affiliate Program: Earn money with your   
 homepage!   
   
2. Frutiger Next Central European: New typographic   
 possibilities for Eastern European languages.   
   
3. Sassoon Value Pack: Five fonts from the renowned   
 Sassoon family of typefaces.   
   
4. Constructivist Type: A review to the "Roaring 20s" and   
 its typefaces.   
   
   
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_   
   
1. Linotype Affiliate Program: Earn money with your   
 homepage!   
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_   
   
Get to know our new, attractive Affiliate Program: Become   
our partner and receive the chance to earn money with our   
many renowned and successful typefaces. In contrast to   
affiliate programs offered by others, our membership   
process has been streamlined, so joining is easy.   
Participation is free-of-charge, and you may place your   
link to us wherever you wish. Of course, there are further   
valuable advantages to partnering with us.   
   
Check them out here:   
 [http://www.linotype.com/16841/linotypepartnerprogram-doc.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100822154814/http:/www.linotype.com/16841/linotypepartnerprogram-doc.html)   
   
   
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_   
   
2. Frutiger Next Central European: New typographic   
 possibilities for Eastern European languages.   
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_   
   
It has become impossible to imagine typographic life   
without the Frutiger family of typefaces, masterpieces that   
come from the world famous type designer Adrian Frutiger.   
Linotype Library is pleased to offer Frutiger Next for a   
couple of years now, which is the most complete and modern   
version of this classic family. Now all weights of the   
Frutiger Next family are available in Central European font   
format as well. With one mouse click, you will be able to   
set text in the Eastern European languages with this   
timeless typeface. Frutiger Next Central European belongs   
to the Linotype Library
